title: Summoner Name- Special characters
body: So im trying to rename my account, and the name i want to go for is exactly 16 characters, five of them being special characters, but it still says it must be between 3-16 characters, so i did the math and apparently special characters count like 2 normal ones, so if you have 15 A's and one special character, it won't work. Is it supposed to work like this, and can i resolve it somehow, maybe support could rename it for me? I have the ip for it ready. I really like the name i chose and dont want to change it at all. Thanks

replies.body:
Special characters can often cause weird interactions with the Client, which is why we typically recommend against using them. If you'd like to see if there's anything one of our account specialists can do to get the summoner name to go through, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you have any other questions, let me know!
